attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Iam concerned about paying more tax on cars. We paid enough as it is. I used my car to travel to work and also I have to visit my clients who is not be able to get out to do their shopping or to go to a bank, post office, etc. There is no way I'm going to pay the extras when I just get on and do my job to help people out there to make their life easier and you Mr Blair, you are making very hard for the likes of me and there is so many people out there who drives,not just for pleasent but have a job to do- taxi, lorries buses,transports to schools. you name it we all use our car for work

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
